Package src.cube

Class RubiksCube

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.cube.RubiksCube
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RubiksCubeInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RubiksCube3X3
    public abstract class RubiksCube
extends java.lang.Object
implements RubiksCubeInterface
    Provides implementation of Cube Interface and allows RubiksCubes of different dimensions to extend all the functionality
    Since:
    JDK 10.0.2

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface src.cube.RubiksCubeInterface

        RubiksCubeInterface.NodeInterface

      • Fields inherited from interface src.cube.RubiksCubeInterface

        Throws:

      • RubiksCube

        public RubiksCube​(int dimension,
                  java.lang.String colorInput)
           throws java.lang.Exception
        constructor which initializes the RubiksCube by creating Nodes
        Parameters:
        dimension - represents dimension of the RubiksCube
        colorInput - represents String that holds all the colors of RubiksCube
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if string input provided to initialize the cube is invalid

        public void setRubiksCube​(boolean type,
                          java.lang.String colorInput)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        initializes the colors of the Cube based on type and colorInput
        Specified by:
        setRubiksCube in interface RubiksCubeInterface
        Parameters:
        type - specifies if the input is from user or colorInput(type can be STRING_INPUT or USER_INPUT)
        colorInput - holds all the colors of the RubiksCube to be initialized
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the RubiksCube couldn't be initialized

      • display

        public void display​(boolean type)
        displays colors present in the cube based on type
        Specified by:
        display in interface RubiksCubeInterface
        Parameters:
        type - type is FACE_WISE,NODE_WISE then color would be displayed face wise, node wise respectively

      • rotate

        public java.lang.String rotate​(int i,
                               boolean direction)
        returns the rotate operation performed in String format
        Specified by:
        rotate in interface RubiksCubeInterface
        Parameters:
        i - i represents the layer of the cube to be rotated
        direction - for direction R_CLK,R_ANTICLK rotation of ith layer of cube happens in clkwise,anticlk direction respectively
        Returns:
        String

      • horizontal

        public java.lang.String horizontal​(int j,
                                   boolean direction)
        returns the horizontal operation performed in String format
        Specified by:
        horizontal in interface RubiksCubeInterface
        Parameters:
        j - j represents the layer of the cube to be moved horizontally
        direction - for direction H_RIGHT,H_LEFT horizontal move of jth layer of cube happens in horizontal right,horizontal left direction respectively
        Returns:
        String

      • vertical

        public java.lang.String vertical​(int k,
                                 boolean direction)
        returns the vertical operation performed in String format
        Specified by:
        vertical in interface RubiksCubeInterface
        Parameters:
        k - k represents the layer of the cube to be moved vertically
        direction - for direction V_UP,V_DOWN vertical move of kth layer of cube happens in vertical up,vertical down direction respectively
        Returns:
        String

      • circleHorizontal

        public java.lang.String circleHorizontal​(boolean direction)
        returns the circleHorizontal operation performed in String format
        Specified by:
        circleHorizontal in interface RubiksCubeInterface
        Parameters:
        direction - for direction H_RIGHT,H_RIGHT entire cube moves towards right,left direction respectively
        Returns:
        String

      • circleVertical

        public java.lang.String circleVertical​(boolean direction)
        returns the circleHorizontal operation performed in String format
        Specified by:
        circleVertical in interface RubiksCubeInterface
        Parameters:
        direction - for direction V_UP,V_DOWN the entire cube moves up,down direction respectively
        Returns:
        String

        Specified by:
        circleRotate in interface RubiksCubeInterface
        Parameters:
